document_data.name: Flame Heather
document_data.mainbody: '''Flame heather''' was a rare plant found only in the mountains of the [[Nakvaligach]] region of the [[Great Glacier]].
document_data.Description: Flame heather grew in clusters of two to four plants, growing to a height of approximately {{SI|1|ft|c|long=yes}}. Its delicate, feather-like leaves were red and yellow.
document_data.Uses: Flame heather took its name from its exceptional flammability. A single cluster could burn throughout the entire night, delivering ample heat to warm a medium-sized [[snowhouse]].
